title: Pan fried salmon with thyme
ingredients: ['2 salmon fillets', '2 teaspoons olive oil, divided', '1/2 onion, sliced into strips', '3 tbsp oyster sauce', '1/2 tsp caster sugar', '1 tsp pepper', '50ml water', 'Marinade', '1 tsp salt', '1 tsp ground black pepper', '2 tbsp chopped fresh thyme', 'dash of dried basil', 'Garnish', '2 to 4 thyme sprigs']
